Title: Requires child day care centers, family day care homes, and any child day care provider notify the municipality in which they intend to operate of their intent to request such a license or registration
Summary: Requires child day care centers, family day care homes, and any child day care provider notify the municipality in which they intend to operate of their intent to request such a license or registration provided such child day care center, family day care home, or child day care provider is located within a city with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Amd ยง390, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring child day care centers, family day care homes, and any child day care provider to notify the municipality in which they intend to operate of their intent to request such a license or registration
